valueProps.text: Simplifies compliance processes, reducing stress for users.

pains: Risk of penalties due to document expiry
proof: Automated tax calculations save up to 40% of time.
Enables firms to manage 30-40% more clients without increasing staff overhead.

facts.text: Tax Star is an AI-powered corporate tax software designed for businesses in the UAE.
facts.evidence: Tax Star is an AI-powered corporate tax software designed for businesses in the UAE.

facts.text: Provides corporate tax calculations, e-invoicing, and Zakat calculations for businesses in Saudi Arabia.
facts.evidence: It provides a comprehensive compliance toolkit that includes corporate tax calculations, e-invoicing, and Zakat calculations for businesses in Saudi Arabia.

facts.text: Automates tax return processes, ensuring timely and accurate submissions.
facts.evidence: AI-Powered Corporate Tax Calculator: Automates tax return processes, ensuring timely and accurate submissions.

facts.text: Facilitates easy production of financial statements.
facts.evidence: IFRS Financial Statements: Facilitates easy production of financial statements, reducing reliance on traditional word processing and spreadsheet software.

facts.text: Automated tax calculations save up to 40% of time.
facts.evidence: Automated Tax Calculations: Saves up to 40% of time by automating workflows, allowing teams to focus on higher-value tasks.

facts.text: Notifies users of impending document expirations to avoid penalties.
facts.evidence: Document Expiry Reminders: Notifies users of impending document expirations to avoid penalties, specifically AED 5,000 for late updates.

facts.text: Automated reminders and tracking systems ensure compliance with tax laws and deadlines.
facts.evidence: Compliance Tracking: Automated reminders and tracking systems ensure compliance with tax laws and deadlines.

facts.text: Simplifies compliance processes, reducing stress for users.
facts.evidence: Simplifies compliance processes, reducing stress for users.

facts.text: Provides a complete toolkit for corporate tax management.
facts.evidence: Provides a complete toolkit for corporate tax management, ensuring businesses remain compliant with local regulations.

facts.text: Offers a free trial for users to explore the software's capabilities.
facts.evidence: However, it offers a free trial for users to explore the software's capabilities before committing to a subscription.

facts.text: Ensures invoices are compliant with Federal Tax Authority (FTA) regulations.
facts.evidence: E-Invoicing (UAE): Ensures invoices are compliant with Federal Tax Authority (FTA) regulations and integrates seamlessly with corporate tax filing.

facts.text: Enables firms to manage 30-40% more clients without increasing staff overhead.
facts.evidence: Scalability: Enables firms to manage 30-40% more clients without increasing staff overhead through automated processes.
